subject_id.Description: Subject ID from BIDS naming (e.g., sub-01)

session_id.Description: Session ID if multi-session dataset, else 'n/a'

bold_num.Description: Number of BOLD fMRI files for this subject/session

t1w_num.Description: Number of T1-weighted structural files for this subject/session

t2w_num.Description: Number of T2-weighted structural files for this subject/session

bold_size.Description: Total size of BOLD files for this subject/session

t1w_size.Description: Total size of T1w files for this subject/session

bold_duration_total.Description: Total BOLD acquisition duration for this subject/session (TR Ã— volumes summed across runs)

bold_duration_mean.Description: Mean BOLD run duration for this subject/session

bold_voxels_total.Description: Total number of voxels across all BOLD files for this subject/session

bold_voxels_mean.Description: Mean number of voxels per BOLD file for this subject/session

datatypes.Description: Comma-separated list of BIDS datatypes present for this subject/session (e.g., 'anat,func,dwi')
